featured.text: Showing great talent in painting, Moran was soon hired as an illustrator at Scribner’s Monthly, and later appointed chief illustrator by age 34.
In 1871, he was appointed to illustrate The Wonders of Yellowstone, a story by Nathaniel P. Langford, who had participated in an expedition to Yellowstone.

definition.zh_def: 指定，任命某人擔任某職位或角色。
definition.en_def: To assign a person to a position or role.
definition.example: The manager will appoint a new team leader next week.
